solution_line_template: There are {num_tables} tables with {fish_per_bowl_standard} fish in a bowl on each, so {num_tables} tables x {fish_per_bowl_standard} fish = <<{num_tables}*{fish_per_bowl_standard}={fish_standard_tables}>>{fish_standard_tables} fish.
One table has an additional fish, so {fish_standard_tables} fish + {extra_fish_on_one_table}xtra fish = {total_fish} fish.
